name: Star Tank
description:
Star Tank is a tribute to the arcades of the early 1980s (Galaxian, Galaga, Space Invaders, Missile Command) and games from the early 1990s (Operation Wolf, Cabal). Show your skills with the controls and become an outstanding pilot of a Startank.
*Arcade.
*Retro.
*Gamepad and Keyboard.
*Vintage.
*20 stages.
*5 bosses.
